body_html:
No, we haven't thought too much about that yet. What would you do with such placeholder variable? You need to be able to execute operations on it right?

I think adding a Keras backend might be easier once we have lazy engine. Then you'll be able to define the whole graph before actually executing it.
body_text:
No, we haven't thought too much about that yet. What would you do with such placeholder variable? You need to be able to execute operations on it right?
I think adding a Keras backend might be easier once we have lazy engine. Then you'll be able to define the whole graph before actually executing it.
body:
No, we haven't thought too much about that yet. What would you do with such placeholder variable? You need to be able to execute operations on it right?

I think adding a Keras backend might be easier once we have lazy engine. Then you'll be able to define the whole graph before actually executing it.
